page.title: 20RECREATION
page.content: Our survey revealed that by far the most popular outdoor activity enjoyed by both mums and dads in the Hullavington area was gardening.Also very popular was cycling and walking. Mums also enjoyed tennis,shopping and walking the dog.Dads were keen on jogging,car maintenance,golf,football, photography and motoring. As far as indoor leisure time was concerned,reading was by far the most popular with both mums and dads.This was followed closely by swimming. Mums also enjoyed cooking, knitting, sewing and D.I.Y. Popular with dads were listening to music,computer games D.I.Y. and weight training. Apart from the sports facilities on the R.A.F. base,available only to service personnel,there are none in the village except the primary school football field.
